description: Vitals are expressed with LOINC codes
detail: Vitals in C-CDA should be coded with LOINC.  Specifically, with codes from the HITSP Vital Sign Result value set.

points.3: > 80% of vitals have an LOINC Vital Sign Result code
points.2: > 50% of vitals have an LOINC Vital Sign Result code
points.1: At least one medication has an LOINC Vital Sign Result code
points.0: No vitals have an LOINC Vital Sign Result code
